description:
Located in New York, New York, the law firm of Arye, Lustig & Sassower, P.C., provides aggressive legal representation for clients who suffered serious injuries as a result of someone else's negligence. Founded in 1965, our law firm has been representing individuals in personal injury cases involving construction accidents, motor vehicle accidents, premises liability incidents, municipal liability and medical malpractice for 45 years.

Our law firm has built a reputation for success. Judges know we take personal injury cases to win them. Other lawyers refer clients to us and routinely seek the assistance of our attorneys. We have recovered more than $400,000 in damages for personal injury victims at trial and in settlements. Drawing on our experience, knowledge and skill, we are dedicated to achieving results for our clients.

Our law firm's attorneys are widely recognized as the leading personal injury lawyers in Manhattan. Our attorneys are members of the Million Dollar Advocates forum, an honorary society for lawyers who have obtained verdicts more than $1 million. They are included in the New York Super Lawyers listing for personal injury. Furthermore, our firm has been AV-rated by Martindale-Hubbell.

At Arye, Lustig & Sassower, every client is important to us. Our clients trust us to help them, and we do everything in our power to justify that trust. We will handle your personal injury case at any stage – whether you have just been injured, are going to trial or are seeking an appeal. For more information, visit our website or our Super Lawyers advertisement.
